sense.def:
The keyboard of a typewriter or a computer terminal
je vrsta tipk, na katere pritiskamo, kadar uporabljamo pisalni stroj ali računalnik.

The keyboard of a piano or organ
je vrsta črnih in belih tipk, na katere pritiskamo, ko igramo na klavir ali orgle.

seg.quote: She reached out her hands to the keyboard and began to play.
